library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(elevatr)
library(raster)
library(rgdal)

# Step 1

goleta = read_csv("../data/uscities.csv") %>% 

# Step 2

  st_as_sf(coords = c("lng", "lat"), crs = 4326) %>% 
  filter(city == "Goleta") %>% 

# Step 3

  st_transform(5070) %>%
  st_buffer(5000) %>% 
  
# Step 4

  st_bbox() %>% 
  st_as_sfc() %>% 
  st_as_sf()

# Step 5

elevation = elevatr::get_elev_raster(goleta, z = 10) %>% 
  crop(goleta)

# Step 6

plot(elevation)

# Step 7 - Raster Properties

elevation
